steps.title: Prepare the Dough
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 2 1/2 cups flour
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 tsp sugar
- 1 packet yeast
- 1 cup warm water

### Prep
- In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and sugar. Dissolve yeast in warm water and let it sit for 5 minutes.

steps.title: Knead the Dough
steps.instructions:
### Mix
- Add yeast mixture to the flour mixture and stir until a dough forms.

### Knead
- Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead for 10 minutes.

### Rise
- Place dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let rise for 1 hour.

steps.title: Prepare Toppings and Bake
steps.instructions:
### Preheat
- Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).

### Roll Dough
- Roll out the dough to your desired thickness.

### Add Toppings
- Spread sauce, cheese, and toppings on the dough.

### Bake
- Bake for 12-15 minutes, until the crust is golden brown and cheese is bubbly.

steps.title: Cook the Pasta
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 200g spaghetti
- Salt

### Cook
- Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain.

steps.title: Prepare the Sauce
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 2 large eggs
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 4 slices bacon, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced

### Prep
- In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.

### Cook Bacon
- In a large pan, cook bacon until crispy. Add garlic and cook for another minute.

steps.title: Combine and Serve
steps.instructions:
### Combine
- Add cooked pasta to the pan with bacon and garlic. Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture. Add reserved pasta water a little at a time until the sauce is creamy.

### Serve
- Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

steps.title: Prepare the Ingredients
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 1 cup butter
- 1 cup sugar
- 1 cup brown sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 tsp vanilla extract
- 3 cups flour
- 1 tsp baking soda
- 2 cups chocolate chips

### Prep
- Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

steps.title: Mix the Dough
steps.instructions:
### Cream Butter and Sugars
- In a large bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.

### Add Eggs and Vanilla
- Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.

### Combine Dry Ingredients
- In another bowl, combine flour and baking soda. Gradually add to the creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips.

steps.title: Bake the Cookies
steps.instructions:
### Drop Dough
- Drop dough by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.

### Bake
- Bake for 8-10 minutes, until edges are golden. Allow to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

steps.title: Gather Ingredients
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 1 head of lettuce
- 1 cucumber
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 red onion
- 1 bell pepper
- 1/2 cup olives
- 1/4 cup feta cheese

### Prep
- Wash and dry all vegetables.

steps.title: Chop Vegetables
steps.instructions:
### Chop
- Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Slice cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and bell pepper into thin slices.

### Combine
- In a large bowl, combine all chopped vegetables and olives.

steps.title: Dress and Serve
steps.instructions:
### Dress
- Drizzle salad with your favorite dressing. Toss to coat all ingredients.

### Serve
- Sprinkle feta cheese on top and serve immediately.

steps.title: Prepare the Steak
steps.instructions:
### Ingredients Needed
- 2 ribeye steaks
- Salt
- Pepper
- Olive oil

### Prep
- Take the steaks out of the fridge 30 minutes before grilling. Rub both sides with olive oil and season generously with salt and pepper.

steps.title: Preheat the Grill
steps.instructions:
### Preheat
- Preheat your grill to high heat (around 450°F to 500°F). Clean and oil the grates.

steps.title: Grill the Steak
steps.instructions:
### Grill
- Place steaks on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare, or to your desired doneness.

### Rest
- Remove steaks from the grill and let rest for 5 minutes before serving.
